name: VR Shooter: zombie shooter for cardboard
name_original: VR Shooter: zombie shooter for cardboard
description:
Zombie Shooting Games by Matrix VR studio is a VR games for google cardboard.
You don't need a VR Player, VR games controller or VR games for bluetooth controller
to play games.
zombie run from hideout, shoot zombies to protect the planet.

Zombie Shooting Games support VR games for oculus too.
Please donwload from the Oculus store or samsung oculus store.

Thank you for downloading our best VR Games free and VR apps free.

Questions or Comments please send email to: best.vr.hk@gmail.com
